faq.question: Can SignServer be deployed on other application servers than JBoss

answer.p: Not by default, but it shouldn't be much work do adopt the deployment scripts to fit other application servers needs. Contact the development team for more information.

faq.question: The web pages if SignServer only works locally, not from other remote machines.

answer.p: This is because by default JBoss only listens on localhost. If you haven't configured http/s during deployment (j2ee.web-nohttps=true) you can edit the server.xml in JBOSS_HOME/server/default/deploy/jboss-web.deployer and change the address of the connector from 127.0.0.1 to 0.0.0.0.
